channel.title: Website on Aaron Berk
channel.description: Recent content in Website on Aaron Berk

item.title: Host a website on GitHub with Hugo
item.description: 16:00 – 17:00, Thursday 11 October 2018, LSK 121. Description Learn how to get up and running with Hugo, a popular open-source static site generator that’s fast and easy to use. Attendees can follow a live coding session to learn how to generate and customize a brand new Hugo website. We’ll learn how to host the website from a GitHub repository using GitHub Pages. Time and interest permitting, we’ll explore how to host the site on a custom domain (like asberk.
